posts.body: Will the wall ever be built?

>>aa8ff392-866d-4d81-b3eb-697f3e3ceabb
>captured 819 IP
This site never felt like it had more than 50 users. They are just gathering random IPs of other journalists at this point.
Thanks for patricipating and helping to distribute i guess.
And why the fuck am i not on that map, even thought that i knowingly run it without Tor for a day to sync stuff faster?

Why are they so scared about it? Is this the first time that they hear about P2P? Peer-to-Peer filesharing like BitTorrent made up >40% of all internet traffic in 2009. 
And they also did run around with that boogeyman that peers see IPs of each other. 

Welcome to the internet outside of Twitter and Facebook, journalists!

>>0cf3a5b1-81d2-4fd7-8dfe-b31bfec57a15
if it's linux, you can use soemthing like
netstat -p | grep python3
And all listed connections should go from localhost:something to localhost:9150 (or whatever your tor por tis), you shouldn't see any connections to anything that isn't localhost.
If you do, but you have Tor on always, you might have to also set proxy for Trackers to Tor.

inb4 it's some faggot LARPing to get muh evil 4chan down too.

Bad luck, bro, 4chan is a compromised honeypot, it will never be taken down.

>>65b9878a-d66c-4733-9a09-3ff1fb5429c9
>this board is dead.
People are scared about 
>muh, have to be behind tor
Because giving your IP away by browsing one of the millions of cloudflare sites is totally fine while P2P, like what Bittorrent does for two decades now, is somehow compromicing their privacy
It will end up being a small circle of /g/entoo + /pol/ crossboarders, sadly.

They shoad the jew before he could expose something that he wouldn't have exposed anyway. 
You can't just commit suicide in a jail cell.

>>cf2479bf-0bdd-4a64-9a27-65e48d947b95
I will jut stick around and see how things develop.
Immediately jumping ship whenever something is not working right for a day isn't the very smartest thing to do.

posts.subject: Fuck discord
posts.body:
Ever witnessed some nice hobby board or general or some community of a fandom that you liked switch do discord?
Suddenly everything is about that faggy discord circlejerk where all people would leave and just the most cancerous fags stay around and it destroys whatver board they come from too, because they live out their drama there.

I hate discord! The fact that its a compromised highly censored shithole is just the cherry on top.
wasn't there on other zeronet chan?

>>7f8fdd5b-b33c-4ac2-bfe2-042f185d5788
http://127.0.0.1:43110/0chan.bit
0chan, but they have no cataloge and tor imageposting is also broken

If you launch a fresh zeronet instance with no data whatsover, the newest posting that you will be able to see is from before the zeroid switch.

Maybe we should relaunch the site under another id, with zeroid since the beginning?

>>6daf316d-e78b-45e8-b915-c7a7e0589b4d
When i do a fresh install, the newest posts that i can see are from before the zeroid switch.

Maybe the BO could just relaunch the site under a new ID with zeroid since the very beginning?
At this point, with all those different issues, it might be the best.

>>71338f82-aa50-4bb4-b94b-3e9bc095150b
Tor image upload still doesn't work, there is a thread in /tech/ about how to update to the newest millchan, this would fix it.
But its a bit hacky and it doesn't work for everyone.

>>86cd080a-3329-4476-ad45-fb0e2f08679e
>every single pic has a different file hash
https://archive.4plebs.org/pol/search/image/EiCTYuNiVL6praPESg4EyQ/
https://archive.4plebs.org/pol/search/image/5vGjNW783wbSUz5ShorGLQ/
https://archive.4plebs.org/pol/search/image/KwMr8e7TY_8wbHPPNyNRcg/
It's a bot.
(or what we definitelly know: it's not someone on a orinary Browser)
Also all threads that he replied to where useless low-quality slide-threads.

I would say those threads are bot generated slide threads and that pic gets bot spamed to generate traffic / bump those.

so what now?
Launch a new site based on millchan with a repository that people can contribute to (maybe even on that github zeronet clone)?
Or just using millchan in the first place?

I like our BO and that the site was launched in the aftermath of gamergate makes it at least very unlikely that hes glowing in the dark.

>>c718ebb3-a8bf-48a6-9a6d-2b3df81c9810
it's good if CodeMonkey waits till the outrage machine moved on to their next boogeyman. Right now they are busy explaining how Epstain commited suicide without being all too obvious about Clinton connections.
Launch it in a few days again and nobody will care.

For zeronet i would prefer it if we have at least some working board where also new people can post.
